swift_bucket_linked: A user linked an Swift container to a project
swift_bucket_unlinked: A user unselected an Swift container in a project
swift_file_added: A user added a file to an Swift container in a project
swift_file_removed: A user removed a file in an Swift container in a project
swift_file_updated: A user updated a file in an Swift container in a project
swift_folder_created: A user created a folder in an Swift in a project
swift_node_authorized: A user authorized the Swift addon for a project
swift_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Swift addon for a project
swift_node_deauthorized_no_user: Swift addon for a project deauthorized
